mergewith.subtemplate:
<plugin id="strictClockModel.$(n)" tree="@Tree.t:$(n)" spec="starbeast3.evolution.branchratemodel.StrictClockModelSB3"> <clock.rate id='SpeciesTreeStrictClockRate' spec='parameter.RealParameter' lower="0.0" value='1.0' estimate='false'/> </plugin>
<operator id="strictClockRateScaler" rootOnly="true" scaleFactor="0.7" spec="BactrianScaleOperator" parameter="@SpeciesTreeStrictClockRate" weight="3.0"/> <prior id="SB3StrictClockPrior" name="distribution" x="@SpeciesTreeStrictClockRate"> <OneOnX name="distr"/> </prior>
Prior on species tree strict clock rate
Scale operator for species tree strict clock rate

<plugin id="relaxedClockModel.$(n)" tree="@Tree.t:$(n)" spec="starbeast3.evolution.branchratemodel.UCRelaxedClockModelSB3" estimateRoot="true" > <clock.rate id='SpeciesTreeRelaxedClockRate.$(n)' spec='parameter.RealParameter' lower="0.0" value='1.0' estimate='false'/> <realRates id="BranchRates.$(n)" spec='parameter.RealParameter' estimate="true" lower="0.0">1</realRates> <stdev id="SpeciesTreeRelaxedClockSD.$(n)" lower="0.0" upper="1.0" estimate="true" spec="parameter.RealParameter">0.1</stdev> </plugin>
<operator id="relaxedClockRateScaler.c:$(n)" rootOnly="true" scaleFactor="0.7" spec="BactrianScaleOperator" parameter="@SpeciesTreeRelaxedClockRate.$(n)" weight="3.0"/> <prior id="SB3RelaxedClockPrior.$(n)" name="distribution" x="@SpeciesTreeRelaxedClockRate.$(n)"> <OneOnX name="distr"/> </prior>
<prior id="ucldStdevPrior.clock.$(n)" name="distribution" x="@SpeciesTreeRelaxedClockSD.$(n)"> <Gamma name="distr" alpha="5" beta="0.05" /> </prior>
<prior id="FastRatePriorDistributionClock.$(n)" name="distribution" x="@BranchRates.$(n)"> <LogNormal M="1.0" S="@SpeciesTreeRelaxedClockSD.$(n)" meanInRealSpace="true" name="distr"/> </prior>
<operator id="AdaptableOperatorSampler.ucldStdev:$(n)" spec="orc.operators.AdaptableOperatorSampler" weight="5.0" parameter="@SpeciesTreeRelaxedClockSD.$(n)"> <operator id="UcldStdevScale.clock.$(n)" parameter="@SpeciesTreeRelaxedClockSD.$(n)" scaleFactor="0.5" spec="BactrianScaleOperator" weight="1"/> <operator id="SampleFromPriorOperator.c:ucldStdev.$(n)" parameter="@SpeciesTreeRelaxedClockSD.$(n)" prior2="@ucldStdevPrior.clock.$(n)" spec="orc.operators.SampleFromPriorOperator" weight="1"/> </operator>
<operator id="AdaptableOperatorSampler.rates:$(n)" parameter="@BranchRates.$(n)" spec="orc.operators.AdaptableOperatorSampler" weight="20"> <operator id="Scale.branchRates.$(n)" parameter="@BranchRates.$(n)" scaleFactor="0.75" spec="BactrianScaleOperator" weight="1.0"/> <operator id="SampleFromPriorOperator.branchRates.$(n)" np="1" parameter="@BranchRates.$(n)" prior2="@FastRatePriorDistributionClock.$(n)" spec="orc.operators.SampleFromPriorOperator" weight="1"/> <operator id="ConstantDistanceOperatorSpeciesTree:$(n)" clock="@relaxedClockModel.$(n)" popsizes="@popSize" proportionalToBranchLength="true" spec="starbeast3.operators.ConstantDistanceOperatorSpeciesTree" tree="@Tree.t:$(n)" twindowSize="0.1" weight="1.0" /> </operator>
<operator id="NEROperator_dAE_dBE_dCE.$(n)" rates="@BranchRates.$(n)" spec="orc.ner.NEROperator_dAE_dBE_dCE" tree="@Tree.t:$(n)" weight="1"/>
<log branchratemodel="@relaxedClockModel.$(n)" id="RateStatLogger.$(n)" spec="beast.evolution.branchratemodel.RateStatistic" tree="@Tree.t:$(n)"/>
Prior on species tree relaxed clock rate
Scale operator for species tree relaxed clock rate
Adaptable operator for species tree relaxed clock branch rates
Prior on species tree relaxed clock standard deviation
Adaptable operator for species tree relaxed clock standard deviation
